rule: The output exceeds 80 words in total length, containing more than 80 words.
input: A snow-covered village in winter, smoke rising from chimneys, children playing.
coverage: Generate a photo of a quaint, snow-covered village in the heart of winter. Chimneys emit gentle plumes of smoke, hinting at cozy warmth within the homes. Groups of children, bundled in vibrant winter clothing, joyfully play in the snow. Capture the scene during late afternoon, with soft, golden sunlight casting a magical glow over the landscape. The background showcases rustic cottages and frosted pine trees, evoking a nostalgic and heartwarming feeling of innocence and tranquility.
validityText:
The input consists of a description that includes subjects (a village and children), their characteristics (snow-covered, smoke rising from chimneys), and an activity (children playing). Although the input does not explicitly mention details about timing, the mention of a "winter" setting implies a seasonal context, which can be associated with timing. There is also a mention of the background ("A snow-covered village") and an indirect evocation of feelings or emotions (the image might evoke feelings of warmth or nostalgic winter scenes due to children playing and smoke rising from chimneys).

The input fully complies with the input specification by including subjects, characteristics, timing details, and some aspects of background and implied emotions, even if these are indirectly inferred through context. Therefore, the input description meets all elements of the specification.

No violation.
OK
